content: striped amethyst scarf feel free to sell your items made from this pattern but please do not copy share or redistribute the pattern if you are selling online i would greatly appreciate a link to my ravelry shop https //www ravelry com/designers/fybre-and-fleece if you have any issues with the pattern or questions please email me at fybreandfleece@gmail com if you would like to feature this pattern on your site please feel free to use one photograph for a roundup post with a link leading back to this post pattern design by fybre and fleece© 2019 level beginner measurements when complete the scarf should measure approx 71 long by 7 ½ wide unstretched gauge 6 row of 14 double_crochet = 4 x4 hook 6 0 mm j/10 hook yarn i used bernat premium which is a number 4 worsted weight i used 2 colors purple and soft grey heather but you could use a third for the middle row if you wanted abbreviations american terms chain - chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half-double_crochet pattern notes fybre and fleece© 2019 pattern design by fybre and fleece© 2019 i used a slightly larger hook than what this yarn asks for because i wanted a looser look to the stitches try to keep your chain chain loose so that the scarf does not warp the turning chain does not count as a stitch pattern row 1 chain 180 180 chain row 2 chain two and turn double_crochet in the third chain from the end and double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet row 3 chain two and turn double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet **change colour here** row 4 chain one and turn half_double_crochet in each stitch 180 half_double_crochet **change colour here** row 5 chain two and turn double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet row 6 chain two and turn double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet **change colour here** row 7 chain one and turn half_double_crochet in each stitch 180 half_double_crochet fybre and fleece© 2019 pattern design by fybre and fleece© 2019 row 8 chain one and turn half_double_crochet in each stitch 180 half_double_crochet row 9 chain one and turn half_double_crochet in each stitch 180 half_double_crochet **change colour here** row 10 chain two and turn double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet row 11 chain two and turn double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet **change colour here** row 12 chain one and turn half_double_crochet in each stitch 180 half_double_crochet **change colour here** row 13 chain two and turn double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet row 14 chain two and turn double_crochet in each stitch 180 double_crochet fasten_off and weave in all ends you can add tassels to the ends of the scarf if desired tutorials youtube tutorial by allfreecrochet - how to change yarn colors end of row youtube tutorial by blossom crochet - how to make and add tassels fybre and fleece© 2019 pattern design by fybre and fleece© 2019 thank you for your purchase i hope you enjoy your new scarf sincerely fybre and fleece
